DOC.brief_summary: Safety Study Rituximab Patients Non Hodgkin Lymphoma ( DLBCL & FL )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients specific type Non Hodgkin lymphoma 1 . Transformed lymphoma follicular lymphoma ( FL ) IIIB 2 . History malignancy could affect compliance protocol interpretation result .
